The academy of true wisdom:, or, The school of vertue. Wherein, one is your master even Christ ... : A work lately compil'd, and brought to its ultimate perfection, / by J.W. Weldon, John. White, J.
[32], 412 p., [1] leaf of plates : ill.
Printed for the author, Rotterdam : 1694.
Dedicatory signed: Jo. Weldon. Attributed to J. White by Wing. Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
=======
